cause.description:
Help us raise money along side of many people in the fight against cancer. Every year people raise money to donate to the American Cancer Society in order to find a cure for all the different types of cancer. As you could guess finding a cure is very expensive and the Cancer Society is a nonprofit organization and needs help getting money to help pay the bills.
1. cancer claims to many lives
2. its time for a cure
cause.name: cancer reaserch
